column2:
The Greco-Roman heathenry is the last surviving branch of the ancient Greek and Roman belief systems. A pantheon of gods under the king of the gods, called Zeus or Jupiter, rules both Heaven and Earth. Other main gods are the god of war, called Ares or Mars, the goddes of marriage, called Hera or Juno, the goddess of Widsom, called Athena or Minerva, and the goddess of fire, called Hestia or Vesta. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! Can raid neighbors for loot
§Y*§! Low-tech non-pagans have very low Supply Limit in Pagan counties
§Y*§! Can declare Subjugation Wars against all other pagans
§Y*§! Rulers are limited to Gavelkind Succession
§Y*§! Rulers cannot declare Holy Wars
§Y*§! Inferior at conversion and vulnerable to non-pagan missionaries
§Y*§! Rulers lose Prestige if at peace for too long
§Y*§! The Greco-Roman Pagan faith can be Reformed

The reformed Greco-Roman Pagan church has a standardized liturgy and a formal church hierarchy modelled after the religious institutions of the old Roman Republic and are led by the Pontifex Maximus, who - much like an Islamic Caliph - is both a secular ruler and the religious leader of the faithful. Defining features in-game:\n§Y*§! Can raid neighbors for loot\n§Y*§! The Pontifex Maximus can call Great Holy Wars

The Censor is responsible for taking the census of the realm. While the office was originally instituded for taxation purposes the most important duty of the Censor is to supervise public morality and recommend suitable candidates for public offices.
The aediles are responsible for maintenance of public buildings and regulation of public festivals.
Originally a very powerful office second only to the Dictator, the Magister Equitum, or Master of the Horse, is now a mostly ceremonial, but still prestigeous, military function.
Did not establish a Greco-Roman state religion
Did not enforce a Greco-Roman state religion
Having long studied the old Greek and Roman classics you are wondering if their religious views wasn't better than your own.
Yes, the old religion was better
No, I'm secure in my faith
As the newly crowned Emperor, you have the opportunity to re-establish the old imperial state religion once again, but your Christian vasals are not likely to appreciate such a decree.
We must restore the glory of the old faith!
Parts of the Empire will convert to the old imperial state religion.\n
Let my vassals choose their own faith.
The newly crowed Emperor has endeavored to restore the ancient faith to the Empire, and demands that you convert.
